TopicTitle: What software to use for modelling?

Articles.Content: Sorry, I know this is kind of a nooby question. But what free software can I get that would work for KSP addons, or is there any at all? If someone can point me in the right direction, I would apreciate it A LOT.

[mod]Please browse the forum thoroughly before assuming a topic has not been discussed. [/mod]

Here is the thread you want to see: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1059.0
blender you wont go wrong....free powerfull tool (some learning curve required but not big)
